value: a few days ago Nike decided to commit
marketing suicide by choosing Colin
Kaepernick as the new face of their
company yeah
Colin Kaepernick the disrespectful cop
hating Che Guevara wearing football and
competent former quarterback who kneeled
during our national anthem because of
racial injustice and oppression you know
what pisses me off the most
Nike had the nerve to create a slogan
for him hinting that he risked
everything to believe in something
believing in what exactly ask any of
these losers who kneel for our national
anthem why they're kneeling specifically
and they won't have a response for you
they won't have response backed up by
facts or statistics and that's because
the police brutality narrative is
it doesn't hold any water and
neither does the oppression part
especially for Kaepernick who has a
shitty NFL quarterback going one in ten
in his last season still had
opportunities to sign with the Baltimore

said no and this was after the kneeling
fiasco so yeah real oppressed after
being brainwashed by his Islamic
girlfriend he decided to spit in the
faces of the people who risked their
lives and died protecting our nation so
he could have the freedom to live out
his childhood dream talk about spoiled
rotten and shame on you Nike for picking
the scumbag you could have picked Tim

because of his faith in God and Jesus

anti-american liberals are not the ones
with the jobs not the ones with the

conservatives who love this country and
that's exactly why Nike stock decided to
take a knee as well dropping over three

in the first 24 hours so good job
Kaepernick your new job cost your new
team billions of dollars and to anybody
out there who's burning their Nike
apparel
please don't instead of doing that sell

my name is Dylan
and those are my two cents
